summary: rhel-system-roles bug fix and enhancement update
details:
The rhel-system-roles package includes a collection of Ansible roles and modules that provide a stable and consistent configuration interface for managing multiple versions of AlmaLinux.

Bug Fix(es) and Enhancement(s):

* Tlog role - Enabling session recording configuration does not work due to RHEL9 SSSD files provider default. (BZ#2074653)

* FIPS mode detection in SSHD role is wrong. (BZ#2075536)
